title: Order Polytopes of Dimension $\leq 13$ are Ehrhart Positive
authors: Feihu Liu, Guoce Xin, Zihao Zhang
abstract:
The order polytopes arising from the finite poset were first introduced and
studied by Stanley. For any positive integer $d\geq 14$, Liu and Tsuchiya
proved that there exists a non-Ehrhart positive order polytope of dimension
$d$. They also proved that any order polytope of dimension $d\leq 11$ is
Ehrhart positive. We confirm that any order polytope of dimension $12$ or $13$
is Ehrhart positive. This solves an open problem proposed by Liu and Tsuchiya.
Besides, we also verify that any $h^{*}$-polynomial of order polytope of
dimension $d\leq 13$ is real-rooted.
